author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove the 0 tolerance overlap issue in the V19 geometry description of CMSSWby Pruthvi

#### PR validation:

Checked with overlap testing tool

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx363AAD Remove the 0 tolerance overlap issue in the V19 geometry description of CMSSWby Pruthvi
